title: Why joining a room takes more then 7 min?
body:
Why I need to wait so long to enter a game? 
It says approximately 42 seconds but this is a lie! 
I wait more then 7 min for every game.

What is this happening? 
Thank you in advance

replies.body: Hmm, could depend on what you're queueing up for at the time.  You're not level 30 yet, so for example not a lot of players might have the required pool yet for picking draft mode summoner's rift.  If it seems to be taking longer than usual, though, then you could have a connection issue sticking to the matchmaking service.  It wouldn't hurt to tune things up through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case!  I hope that helps!
